data.text: The School of ANIMATION ARTS forms part of our fully accredited Bachelor of Film Arts degree with major subjects such as 3D Animation, Game Design and Motion Design. The School of Animation Arts delivers a hands-on education with an accomplished faculty that focuses on helping students discover their talents, celebrate creativity and unlock the potential of technology. In this School, the narrative remains at the core of its disciplines, whether it is delivered by the moving image or handing over control of an interactive experience. We push the boundaries of our imagination to breathe life into new creations. Students learn the fundamental principles that fuel the medium and develop their own distinct artistic voice.
